category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Refresh_Warning_Threshold
preference.preference_description: Defines a threshold number to show a warning message when users refresh a large amount of selected objects using the Refresh command in the global toolbar and menu. Increasing the default value (200) may cause the rich client to take a long time to complete the refresh process due to its current memory allocation. This preference applies to the Refresh command in the global toolbar and menu, but not to any refresh command on the view toolbar or dropdown menu. Valid Values: Any integer.
